# GuidanceSoftware
This a practical assessment I built for GuidePoint Security's application security hiring process, in order to evaluate new candidates and their skills.

This application should be built as a standalone JAR, and requires Java 8.  When you run the JAR for the first time, you should see the following output: 

```
###################################################################
#  We've stolen classified SpaceX navigational software ...       #
#  and plan to hijack the rockets used for the Mars missions ...  #
#  ... can you help us find any vulns?                            #
###################################################################

[2015.20.14 - 10:20:50] Loading GuidanceSoftware ....
[2015.20.14 - 10:20:50] 00000001 00000001 00000001 00000001 00000001 00000001 00000001
```
